author: Will Canny, AI Boost
title: Bitcoin $200K Target Still in Play, Driven by ETF, Corporate Treasury Buying: StanChart
description: Bullish catalysts include sustained ETF inflows, corporate treasury adoption and U.S. regulatory moves, the report said.
content:
